Micah 5:2 - Ruler from Bethlehem

ID
1
Source Verse
Micah 5:2
Summary
A ruler will come from Bethlehem, prophesied to be the Messiah.
Type
Direct
Category
Birth
Fulfilled
true
Confidence
High

Fulfillment

This prophecy is fulfilled in the birth of Jesus Christ in Bethlehem.

Historical Context

  • Micah 5:2 was written around 1200 BCE.
  • Bethlehem was a small town, significant in Messianic prophecy.

Related Evidence

  • Amarna Letters - Canaanite Correspondence
